cover.title: Let your brand speak for you!
cover.subtitle: Your customer's first contact with you is your brand.

purpose.title: What is Our Purpose
purpose.paragraph:
We're passionate about going deep and thinking about every detail, thus exploring the infinite possibilities of Design. That's the spirit that rules our work.

In such a stormy world, less is more. Having clear and assertive communication is essential to stand out. We specialize in creating unique and memorable projects exploring the best in each business. Let's do a remarkable project?

services.title: Brand Design
services.subtitle: Your Brand goes beyond the visual!
services.paragraph: It's not enough to have only a basic logo to represent your company. Your brand needs to communicate your company values, it is your customer's first contact with you. We study and elaborate every detail so that your company has a strong, cohesive, and eye-catching brand. Here's what we offer:

features.title: Visual Identity
features.description: Color Scheme, Typography, Patterns, and More

features.title: Brand Collaterals
features.description: Stationery, Packaging, Signage, and Any Other Materials You Might Need

services.title: Web Design
services.subtitle: Out of sight, out of mind!
services.paragraph: Where people can learn more about your company's history, values, or even about your products and services. What big business you know doesn't have a website? You need one too, and we can help you with that. Here's what we offer:

features.title: Website
features.description: Responsive Design for Desktop and Mobile Devices

features.title: Blogs
features.description: Made for Content Creation with our Management System Integration

features.title: Landing Pages
features.description: Focus on Marketing or Advertising Campaign

features.title: E-commerce
features.description: Web Store for Selling Products and Services

projects.title:
Trusted By 
Many Clients 
Around the World
projects.subtitle: Projects & Reviews
projects.paragraph: We are a team with vast experience, having already served clients around the world, always delivering beautiful and creative results. Check out some of our projects and understand more about our work, style, and quality.

cards.body: Highly refined sense of design and aesthetics; Very passionate individual who puts in a lot of thought to his work; Detail oriented; Good communication and understands requirements; Patient and cooperative; Takes feedback well. We recruited us for our second project already!
cards.author: Paras Mehta

cards.body: They delivered a logo that met and exceeded our expectations, the first go. The logo presented to us was simple (in the best way possible), bold, and captured who we are as a company. We could not be any happier and would gladly work with Br.Storm again!
cards.author: Michael Smith

cards.body: The best designers I’ve ever worked with, they know a lot about visual identity and took care of every detail so that the result turned out unique as I wanted.
cards.author: Willian Medeiros

cards.body: We've spent a lot of time looking for the perfect logo. His process really helped bring out the soul of our logo, but it was the execution that really blew us away. If you've been searching as we have, stop-the journey ends here. Highly highly recommended.
cards.author: Jarrod Milford

cards.body: Kelvin is one of the best branding specialists I've worked with and will definitely come again. Thanks!
cards.author: Hazem Alshakr

whyUs.title: Reasons Why Hire UsWhy Hire Us
whyUs.subtitle:
We always strive for the best, in everything 
we do we always focus on delivering:

cards.title: Autonomy and Freedom
cards.body: We provide tools that allow you to use the project without an expert.

cards.title: Premium Support
cards.body: You will never be helpless, we provide our private phone number and you can contact us whenever you need.

cards.title: Tailor-made for your Business
cards.body: Exclusive design, made especially for your business.

cards.title: Perfect Delivery
cards.body: Unlimited revisions, we will adjust whatever it takes so that the project delivery turns out perfect.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.paragraph:
What did you think? If you have any doubts to clear or
questions to ask, feel free to schedule a meeting with us.

hero.title: Hi
hero.subtitle: We will bring value to
hero.text: We prepared a brief presentation for you to better know us and the solutions we provide.

details.title: What is a Brand Project
details.subtitle: Your brand goes beyond the visual!
details.text:
A well-planned and striking visual identity is a fundamental step to present yourself to your client as a company in which he can believe and invest.


Big names in the market are represented by images and colors that awaken our memory, even unconsciously. It is this type of impact that you must make on your audience: a visual identity that makes your mission visible and makes you recognizable anywhere.

steps.name: Design Brief
steps.text: Gathering of all essential information for project execution.

steps.name: Research
steps.text: Briefing study, competition analysis, market research and mental map.

steps.name: Design Concepts
steps.text: Brainstorm, moodboard, sketches, prototypes and tests.

steps.name: Refinement
steps.text: Typography definition, symbol, color scheme and other visual elements.

steps.name: Presentation
steps.text: Description of the paths to the achieved result and elaboration of visual samples.

steps.name: Feedback and Review
steps.text: Project validation and, if necessary, adjust and adapt to the client's expectations.

steps.name: Brand Collaterals
steps.text: Development of all complementary materials included in the brand package.

steps.name: Final Delivery
steps.text: Finalization and delivery of the project, followed by attendance and support on the brand use.

deliverables.title:
The Best Choice for 
 Your Business
deliverables.subtitle: Our Service Packages
deliverables.text:
No matter the size or phase of your business, we can
certainly help you choose the package that suits you.
deliverables.note: Note: To find out more about our payment terms and conditions please contact us.

packages.name: Starter
packages.longText: This package basically includes the brand and all its assets. The needful for starting your business.

packages.name: Essential
packages.longText: Ideal for those who already have a more organized business and need some essential materials as well.

included.name: Brandbook
items: Brand usage manual with all visual guidelines.

packages.name: Premium
packages.longText: Ideal for those who already have a more organized business and need some essential materials as well.

included.name: Extended Collaterals
items: And 5 more items of your choice.

included.name: Brandbook
items: Brand usage manual with all visual guidelines.

cover.title: Hi, Fabio and Sara!
cover.subtitle: We will help Bronzo grow.
cover.text: We prepared a brief presentation for you to better know us and the solutions we provide.

details.title:
Out of sight,
Out of Mind!
details.subtitle: Why invest in a website?
details.text:
Did you ever think about having a showcase that can be seen anywhere? And be able to sell 24h a day, 7 days a week? That's the potential of a website.

A well-planned website greatly expands the boundaries of the business! Without a website, your business is invisible to the thousands of people who search for your services every day on Google.

whyUs.title: Reasons Why Hire UsWhy Hire Us
whyUs.subtitle:
We always strive for the best, in everything 
we do we always focus on delivering:

cards.title: Ideation and Strategy
cards.body: We explore and deeply understand every detail of each demand.

cards.title: Full Customization
cards.body: We design your website tailor-made, 100% exclusive layouts for your brand.

cards.title: Fast and Intuitive
cards.body: We work with cutting-edge technology that guarantees greater speed and smoothness in navigating.

cards.title: Premium Support
cards.body: You will never be helpless, you can contact us whenever you need.

cards.title: Responsiveness
cards.body: Your website at your fingertips! We create a version for each device: PC, Tablet and Smartphone.

cards.title: Google Analytics
cards.body: Monitor your website traffic! We configure and make your Google Analytics available.

cards.title: Search Engine Optimization
cards.body: We optimize the project so that your site is well placed in Google searches.

cards.title: Integration
cards.body: Integration with Email Marketing, Social Networks, Google Analytics, WhatsApp…

steps.name: Strategy
steps.text: Understanding of the business goals and mapping of the project's needs.

steps.name: Structure
steps.text: Content architecture and organization, sketching of the skeleton and page navigation.

steps.name: Design
steps.text: Definition of all guidelines and visual aspects such as text, typography, shapes and colors.

steps.name: Development
steps.text: Coding of the visual components and creation of interactive and functional items.

steps.name: Delivery
steps.text: Testing and bug fixing, implementation and hosting, redirects and project publishing.

steps.name: Support
steps.text: Provision of a project use guide accompanied by training in handling.

addons.title:
Website 
Add-ons
addons.text: Increase your website's reach potential with these add-ons. Apply along with your order.

blog.title: Blog
blog.body: Content creation portal aimed at reaching and maintaining the relationship with the target audience.

langs.title: Extra Languages
langs.body: We live in the age of Globalization! Make your website available in multiple languages and win international customers.
